title: Verify product listing displays all products on Home Screen
description: Check that all products are displayed correctly in a grid on the Home Screen upon app launch.

steps.description: Launch the app
Verify Home Screen displays a grid of all available products with images, names, and prices
Ensure products are loaded without delay or error messages

title: Product filtering by category
description: Verify products are correctly filtered when a category chip is selected on the Home Screen.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate to Home Screen
Select a category chip from the category filter bar
Check that only products belonging to the selected category are displayed
Verify products from other categories are not shown
Deselect the category chip
Verify the product grid returns to show all products

title: Product filtering by search input
description: Ensure the search bar filters products based on user input in real time.

steps.description: Launch the app and navigate to Home Screen
Enter a product name or partial name into the search bar
Verify products displayed include only those whose names match the search term
Ensure the product grid updates dynamically with each keystroke
Clear the search input
Verify full product list is restored

title: Navigate to Product Detail Screen from Home Screen
description: Verify user can tap on a product card to navigate to its detail screen showing full details.

steps.description: On Home Screen, tap on a product card
Verify navigation to Product Detail Screen occurs
Check that product image, name, price, description, and other details are displayed correctly

title: Add product to cart with default quantity
description: Verify that tapping add to cart on Product Detail Screen adds one unit to the shopping cart.

steps.description: On Product Detail Screen, tap 'Add to Cart' button without changing quantity
Verify the cart provider adds the selected product with quantity 1
Navigate to Cart Screen via bottom navigation
Verify the added product is listed with quantity 1 and correct price

title: Update product quantity in cart and verify total price update
description: Verify users can increase or decrease the quantity of items in the cart and that total price updates correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Cart Screen with existing cart items
Increment quantity of a cart item
Verify quantity increments by 1 and the total price reflects the change
Decrement quantity of the same cart item
Verify quantity decrements by 1 and the total price updates accordingly
Decrement quantity until product quantity reaches zero
Verify product is removed from the cart and total updates

title: Remove product from cart
description: Verify removing a product from the cart updates the cart and total price correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to Cart Screen with multiple items in cart
Tap remove/delete button on a product in the cart
Verify product is removed from cart list
Verify total price updates to exclude removed product

title: Navigate between Home, Cart, and Menu using bottom navigation
description: Verify smooth and correct navigation among the three main screens using the bottom navigation bar.

steps.description: Launch app on Home Screen
Tap the Cart tab on bottom navigation
Verify Cart Screen is displayed
Tap Menu tab on bottom navigation
Verify Menu Screen is displayed
Tap Home tab on bottom navigation
Verify Home Screen is displayed again

title: Checkout process with valid delivery and payment simulation
description: Verify user can complete checkout by entering delivery information and making a simulated payment.

steps.description: Add product(s) to cart and navigate to Cart Screen
Tap 'Proceed to Checkout' button
Verify navigation to Checkout Screen occurs
Enter valid delivery details (name, address, phone number)
Select simulated payment method and submit
Verify order is processed and confirmation screen/message is displayed
Verify user can continue shopping or exit after confirmation

title: Checkout with missing required delivery information
description: Verify app prevents checkout submission if required delivery fields are missing or invalid.

steps.description: Navigate to Checkout Screen with items in cart
Leave one or more required delivery fields empty or invalid
Attempt to submit checkout form
Verify validation error messages are displayed for missing/invalid fields
Ensure payment simulation does not proceed

title: Cart state persistence across app restarts
description: Verify cart contents persist correctly when the app is closed and reopened using local storage.

steps.description: Add products to cart
Verify cart contents and total price are correct
Close the app completely
Relaunch the app
Verify cart contents and total remain as before app was closed

title: Theme consistency across all screens
description: Verify that the custom app theme is applied consistently on Home, Cart, Product Detail, Checkout, and Menu screens.

steps.description: Navigate to each main screen: Home, Product Detail, Cart, Checkout, and Menu
Verify color scheme, fonts, button styles, and other theme elements are consistent with the custom theme
Check UI elements conform to Material Design guidelines consistently

title: State synchronization between product listing and cart
description: Verify that adding products to cart updates the cart provider and that the UI reflects the current cart state immediately.

steps.description: On Product Detail Screen, add a product to cart
Verify cart provider state updates immediately
Navigate to Cart Screen
Verify the cart UI shows the newly added product with correct quantity
Remove product from cart and return to Home Screen
Verify product count badges, cart indicators, and provider state reflect removal

title: Search input with no matching results
description: Verify that the app displays an appropriate message or empty state when no products match search input.

steps.description: On Home Screen, enter a search term that matches zero products
Verify that the product grid is empty
Check that a 'No products found' or similar message is displayed

title: Add multiple quantities of a product from Product Detail Screen
description: Verify that users can set quantity > 1 before adding a product to cart, and that the cart reflects the correct quantity and price.

steps.description: Navigate to a Product Detail Screen
Increase the quantity selector to a number greater than 1
Tap 'Add to Cart' button
Verify cart contains the correct product with selected quantity
Go to Cart Screen
Verify total price is quantity * product price
